Counter Strike Global Offensive. I've put so much of my time into this game. Was this game good back in 2015 to 2016? Absolutely. Is it still good today? Well, mostly. I won't lie and say that CSGO Has a perfect record of being the best game ever created. It's definitely gone down in quality. The rank system is completely broken. And even though new players have an easier time than before that update, players who were directly affected are still suffering. Left in silver hell. But. The reason I still play this game, Is because It is just genuinely fun. The ranked play on this game is something most people stopped taking so seriously, making it more of a chilled out game than a competitive one. And come on, If you said to me that you hadn't played counter strike, I'd slap you. And now it's free. Just download it. It's gotta be the most "Must play" game ever.
